title: Allows the Westchester joint water works, a non-profit utility, the authority to increase the per meeting compensation of the members of the board of trustees
summary: Allows the Westchester joint water works, a non-profit utility, the authority to increase the per meeting compensation of the members of the board of trustees to up to $200.

S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                         3244

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                   January 24, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by M. of A. LATIMER -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Local Governments

       AN ACT to amend chapter 654 of the laws of 1927, relating to joint water
         works systems, in relation to compensation  paid  to  members  of  the
         board of trustees of the Westchester joint water works

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 7 of section 3 of chapter 654 of   the laws  of
    2  1927,  relating  to joint water works systems, as amended by chapter 232
    3  of the laws of 2006, is amended to read as follows:
    4    7. Each member of the board of trustees shall be entitled  to  receive
    5  the sum of ten dollars as compensation for his OR HER attendance at each
    6  meeting of the board of trustees except that each member of the board of
    7  trustees  of  the  Westchester  joint  water  works shall be entitled to
    8  receive the sum of up to [one] TWO hundred dollars. Prior to the  opera-
    9  tion  of a system under this act said compensation shall be added to the
   10  cost of acquisition thereof.  After the commencement of the operation of
   11  such a system said compensation shall be chargeable to the cost of oper-
   12  ation thereof.
   13    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.




        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD06227-01-1
